text: <@U01QVR44MEY> - this has been submitted to our tech writing team - thank you!

Hi
Is there any way to implement chat GPT within HubSpot live chatbot? Does anyone have an idea it would be appreciated.

Any chance contact variables in GraphQL queries in emails are going to be implemented soon?  We've got a huge enterprise client that this would be _incredibly_ helpful for.  I can do regular queries, but if I try to pass in contact.email everything comes up null.
Hi there, please avoid asking the same question in multiple channels. Thank you!
